english: Love me more, love me more
How is it? Love me more
Love me more, love me more
How is it? More—just this isn't enough
I'm curious, where are you looking?
I just want you to face me
A marionette that only seems reserved
No matter what, nothing changes
I'm not the main character
I want to do something about it
I don’t want to understand
I don’t care about adult matters
Hiding everything,
Playing mind games—can't do that
I decided to go straight through
Why, why, why do I want you so badly?
Maybe it's my possessiveness
Do you prefer that little devil girl?
Love is painful
The more and more I fall for you,
The farther away you seem
If I don't open my heart, you won't notice
That's what frustrates me
Hey, make it clear—this love, oh, how cruel
Les Misérables
Playing house with innocent feelings
Still a child, still aware
This feeling—just this isn't enough
Wanting to be straightforward
Is that just an excuse for not playing games?
If I could change to be the way you want, would I be happy?
I'm not a nameless flower, I am me
I want you to know, I want to make the world turn to me
Change, world
Somehow, somehow, somehow
I want you to keep looking at me
Maybe it's my self-assertion
Do you prefer someone who plays hard to get?
Hurry and notice me

But I don't want to know

I don't know where they belong
Just make it clear already—this love, oh, how cruel
Les Misérables

With all my heart?

indonesian: Cintai aku lebih, cintai aku lebih

Bagaimana? Lebih—hanya ini saja tidak cukup
Aku penasaran, ke mana kau melihat?
Bagaimanapun juga, tak ada yang berubah
Aku tak peduli urusan orang dewasa
Bermain trik—aku tak bisa melakukan itu
Kenapa, kenapa, kenapa aku sangat menginginkanmu?
Apa kau lebih suka gadis kecil yang menggoda itu?
Jika aku tak membuka hati, kau takkan menyadarinya
Hei, jelaskan padaku—cinta ini, betapa kejamnya
Masih seperti anak kecil, masih sadar
Perasaan ini—hanya ini saja tidak cukup
Apakah itu hanya alasan karena tak bisa bermain trik?
Jika aku bisa berubah sesuai keinginanmu, akankah aku bahagia?
Aku bukan bunga tak bernama, aku adalah aku
Aku ingin kau tahu, aku ingin dunia menoleh padaku

Mungkin, mungkin saja jawabannya sudah ada

Aku tak tahu di mana tempatnya

Aku harap hari itu akan datang
